OOC:I had actually planned to use the dust before it settled but thats ok.  

BIC:Ultimo kicks his one good foot up dust spraying out at Hellpeon eyes, now pushing back iwth his foot rolls backwards again narrowly missing the slice.  He then threw the gun around his shoulder so it now rested on his back and thrust out his hand to nothing.  Hacha who was now behind Hellpeon was sucked into the air by some force, transforming to his energon axe mode and sailing through the air directly at Hellpeons back, quite intent on going stragiht through and into Ultimo's hand.
